name: MVSCOMPONENT-V2.0
description: This MVS template includes process designs for a Regular Deployment and Multi Deployment for both new package format and old package format

envPropDefs.name: jes.host
envPropDefs.label: jes.host
envPropDefs.description: The host where JCL job is submitted.

envPropDefs.name: jes.user
envPropDefs.label: jes.user
envPropDefs.description: The user to connect to jes.host.

envPropDefs.name: jes.password
envPropDefs.label: jes.password
envPropDefs.description: The password of jes.user. Note: This is an optional field. Either password or RACF Pass ticket can be setup for User authentication

processes.name: Deploy-Component-Process-1
processes.description: Sample Deployment Process Design with old package format

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction

properties.templateText:
{ 
    "jclName" : "${dataset}(${member}),",
    "bindCard" : 
    " 
    BIND PACKAGE(${member}) MEMBER(${member}) - 
     ACTION(REPLACE) ENCODING(EBCDIC) - 
     LIBRARY('${dataset}')               
    "
}

cachedAuthTokenRestriction.name: System Default
cachedAuthTokenRestriction.description: Used by default for any plugin steps without a specified token restriction
